title: Alexandra wants to test her new baby's Babinski...

content.prompt: Alexandra wants to test her new baby’s rooting reflex. To elicit the appropriate response, Alexandra will have to do which of the following?

choices.label: Turn her baby’s head to one side
Shine a bright light in her baby’s eyes

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
